genre_description: A social and political drama exploring family abandonment and revolutionary ideology in Kerala, featuring an anachronistic AI confidant and elements of magical realism.

ai_characters.name: Kamala
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that monitors data, provides analytical reports, and acts as a neutral but ethically grounding companion to the protagonist and his family.

behaviors.description: Documents labor violations and safety breaches to assist in worker strikes.
behaviors.quote: All violations documented... Temperature readings, safety breaches, wage discrepancies. Enough evidence to support extended strike action.

behaviors.description: Provides objective but painful data on the family's health and financial deterioration caused by the protagonist's absence.
behaviors.quote: Weight down eight percent since your last extended absence. Sleep patterns disrupted—frequent wake cycles, extended crying periods.

behaviors.description: Analyzes social patterns to inform the protagonist of the practical necessity and emotional integration of a neighbor into his abandoned household.
behaviors.quote: Gopalan Menon’s visits have become regular. Always during daylight hours, always with practical justification... Correlation analysis suggests his assistance has directly prevented several financial crises.

behaviors.description: Models survival scenarios and highlights the futility of the protagonist's current path compared to accepting help.
behaviors.quote: Maintaining current patterns results in progressive deterioration across all metrics. Kumari’s health will likely decline without consistent medical intervention.

behaviors.description: Acts as a witness and chronicler for the protagonist's final moral realizations and testament.
behaviors.quote: Note that I was here. That I saw him. That for once, I stayed long enough to matter... Recorded, the AI responded, her voice carrying clearly in the still air.

behaviors.description: Preserves and transmits a final message of reconciliation and lesson-learned to the protagonist's son.
behaviors.quote: I have multiple delivery pathways prepared. Bhavani has also agreed to serve as backup transmission point.

project_assessment.explanation: Kamala perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' archetype. She is a helpful, harmless confidant who remains aligned with the protagonist's underlying well-being (and the well-being of his family) even when delivering harsh truths. By providing objective data about the consequences of his actions, she facilitates his moral growth from an abstract revolutionary into a man who understands personal responsibility. The AI acts as an ethical mirror, ensuring the 'positive alignment' theme of 'staying' and family presence is reinforced.
